# ZeroPoolNetwork

## Description
ZeroPoolNetwork is a pure JavaScript library for iterating with ZeroPool Ethereum smart contract.

## Installation
todo

## Usage
```javascript
const zp = new ZeroPoolNetwork(contractAddress, ethPrivateKey, zpMnemonic);
```

### Deposit
```javascript
zp.deposit("0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000", 10000001n)
  .then(console.log)
```

### My Deposits
```javascript
zp.myDeposits()
  .then(console.log)
```

### Cancel Deposit
```javascript
const deposit = { 
  token: '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000',
  amount: '10000001',
  txhash: '0x53f654b28f6f3e64c4621d497e048c23b8bbffd84260d358f190cdce460688d3',
  owner: '0xF0E1831dFeC63ee3c5d536Ce362A0AD178dD9aAD',
  blocknumber: 60 
}; 

zp.depositCancel(deposit)
  .then(console.log)
```

### Publish blocks
```javascript
const block = {
  deposit_blocknumber: 78,
  proof:
    [7188805172584644210884533817994517342108834983694482073832509198626221549556n,
      19725382261949859686046575831503219973384011570696479970325518700585013664872n,
      2145837431401873811719620545249201243271605534725894895096125295622007953849n,
      13167792922941551836933498457206259142886180317710511485488778333017553053972n,
      2891525888206246112680299871004142922205692606960080098318018917714268650189n,
      3385433289151949804021590217906197567205639672489776461243816609965959139562n,
      21606865409177870506368517137767874825394580459452148157226968532811717929704n,
      2944186408666030647284448038014064148309556955578308487212799997214223155147n],
  message1:
    [88610789643264749086093888604821918075072654457495100783092623182350624449n,
      '0x00000000000000000000000000000000000000004276489736969202992775863017697177808476567624468705080121797100863351334277',
      17176975240209325836751406465417417356355450324148401149267230768527882499517n,
      10557896580460801703817754358970109672317461689524740732076068416952882440686n],
  message2:
    [1311595181848904312778477954939756886975060884943382573400822783253427978613n,
      '0x00000000000000000000000000000000000000002584972757711529632560000943871540247361838579221431711439635694844503060983',
      2706095485113298399472098608098336874940929441565690772587098335835040944484n,
      11938757745854449199920842833440289407471985582951648348279537546601543172278n],
  owner: '0x5c526bc400c619Ca631619F52C58545ad56a0F19',
  delta: 10000001n,
  token: '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000',
  utxo:
    [13370152963212911591695736541293162093707084199212135194755628543498779666788n,
      4239520583798901524688337201390250512956991400200384652431070529800919593564n],
  nullifier:
    [13848655788791697767848647885095914154288962259176064977624844017713772499328n,
      14694488265057663673948155287612812900638475895235378567551946704298079774378n],
  rootptr:
    '0x9867cc5f7f196b93bae1e27e6320742445d290f2263827498b54fec539f756af',
  new_root:
    14104184488280208113507267975575830716113766176269610157743431475904840124775n
}

zp.publishBlockItems([block])
  .then(console.log)
```
